record.title: Surrogate markers of insulin resistance and coronary artery disease in type 2 diabetes: U-shaped TyG association and insights from machine learning integration.
record.subjects: Diabetes Mellitus, Type 2 blood ; Coronary Artery Disease blood ; Insulin Resistance ; Machine Learning ; Triglycerides blood ; Biomarkers blood ; Blood Glucose metabolism ; Humans ; Male ; Female ; Middle Aged ; Aged ; Body Mass Index ; ROC Curve ; Cholesterol, HDL blood ; Waist Circumference ; Logistic Models
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: The research ethics committee of Tehran University of Medical Sciences approved this study. All participants provided written informed consent before participating, and the study adhered to the declaration of Helsinki. Consent for publication: Not applicable. Competing interests: The authors declare no competing interests.
